```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(flexdashboard)
library(here)
library(rio)
library(tidyverse)
library(magrittr)
library(lme4)
library(lmerTest)
```

```{r include = FALSE}
# import data
df <- import(here("data", "ALL_MFQ30.csv"),     # moral values, countries, & sex
             setclass = "tbl_df") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

df_c <- import(here("data", "Data_S1_sec.csv"), # country-level variables
               setclass = "tbl_df") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

# data wrangling
df %<>% 
  mutate(
    across(where(is.double), as.numeric),   # from double to numeric
    across(where(is.character), as.factor), # from character to factor
    
    sex = recode(sex,                       # recode sex variable
                 `1` = "Male",
                 `0` = "Female",
                 .default = NA_character_)
  )

# check data structure and variables
str(df)

```
